dcterms:creator: A. Wu
W. S. Zheng
H. X. Yu
S. Gong
J. Lai
dcterms:description: SYSU-MM01 is the first large-scale benchmark dataset for visible-infrared person re-identification, collected by 4 visible and 2 infrared cameras in both indoor and outdoor environments, containing 395 identities with 22,258 visible images and 11,909 infrared images.
dcterms:title: SYSU-MM01

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
H. Wang
dcterms:description: RegDB is a harsh lighting dataset collected by a dual-camera system, containing 206 identities for training and testing, with each person having 10 visible images and 10 infrared images, and includes two test modes.
dcterms:title: RegDB

dcterms:creator: Y. Zhang
H. Wang
dcterms:description: LLCM is a recently proposed low-light visible-infrared person re-identification dataset collected by 9 cameras in low-light environments, containing 30,921 images of 713 identities for training and 13,909 images of 351 identities for testing.
dcterms:title: LLCM
